alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 1:10PM PST until January 09 at 8:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM PST /MIDNIGHT MST/ MONDAY TO 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM PST /midnight MST/ Monday to 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
